com.samysadi.acs.utility.random

Class Uniform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samysadi.acs.utility.random.AbstractRandom
      • com.samysadi.acs.utility.random.Uniform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NumberGenerator

    public class Uniform
extends AbstractRandom
    For more details on the implementation, refer to the cumulative distribution function in wikipedia.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Samy Sadi , Belabbas Yagoubi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Uniform()
      Creates a new instance based on the current simulator's random generator.
      Uniform(double max)
      Creates a new instance based on the current simulator's random generator.
      Uniform(double min, double max)
      Creates a new instance based on the current simulator's random generator.
      Uniform(double min, double max, Random generator) 
      Uniform(double max, Random generator)
      Equivalent to Uniform(generator, 0.0d, max).
      Uniform(Random generator)
      Equivalent to Uniform(generator, 0.0d, Double.MAX_VALUE).
